channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Universal Device Client (UDC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Universal Device Client (UDC)

item.title: CVE-2023-3078|2024-01-03T21:10:30.242Z -- lenovo -- universal%20device%20client%20%28udc%29
item.description: An uncontrolled search path vulnerability was reported in the Lenovo Universal Device Client (UDC) that could allow an attacker with local access to execute code with elevated privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-6338|2024-01-03T21:00:26.988Z -- lenovo -- universal%20device%20client%20%28udc%29
item.description: Uncontrolled search path vulnerabilities were reported in the Lenovo Universal Device Client (UDC) that could allow an attacker with local access to execute code with elevated privileges.
